sentences.english: Fellow entertainers including Chow Yun-Fat, the couple's long-time friend, have sent condolences.
sentences.chinese: 娱乐圈内演艺人员包括挚友周润发前至哀悼慰问。

sentences.english: Hu Mei and Chow Yun-fat did not help things.
sentences.chinese: 导演胡玫和周润发对此也没有提供一些帮助。

sentences.english: Chow Yun Fat(Zhou Runfa) together with Zhujun performed the ancient prostration ceremony toward the audiences.
sentences.chinese: 朱军和周润发一起向观众行古代跪拜礼？
